Tools

Import performer CSV and browse/select a media folder mounted into the container.

Maintenance

Sane defaults: these actions are destructive and cannot be undone.

Index sample_media

This scans all files under /media (mounted from ./sample_media), stores them in the DB, and matches performers with media files.

Import Performers CSV

Required header: Name. Use the same headers as listed in README.md.

Browse Media Folder

Containers can only see folders mounted into /media. Current selected folder is stored in the DB.
Selected path: (loading...)
Current folder: (root)
No items (or folder not accessible).
